name: Bot Status Checker
description: A Telegram bot that monitors the uptime status of specified bots and updates in a designated channel.

SESSION_STRING.description: Your Telegram account session string. Check README for details.

CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the channel where status updates will be sent

MESSAGE_IDS.description: IDs of messages to be edited, separated by spaces if more than one

BOTS.description: List of bot usernames to monitor, separated by spaces
